title: OpenTender – Procurement Transparency Tool
goal: Detect anomalies in government procurement data.
why_it_matters: Public contracts often lack scrutiny; this project exposes bidding fairness.
data: Tender announcements, bids, contractor records (World Bank, Open Contracting Data Standard).
ai: Outlier detection in bid amounts and timelines.
workflow: Summarize top risk projects per region.
outcome: High-impact data ethics + ML governance case.
